alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 5:50PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Grafton and west central Carroll Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 550 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodstock, or 10 miles north of Plymouth, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lincoln, Plymouth, Woodstock, Sandwich, Tamworth, Albany, Benton, Easton, Ellsworth, Rumney, Campton, Warren, Thornton, Waterville Valley, Livermore, and Wentworth. This includes Interstate 93 between mile markers 83 and 107. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for northern New Hampshire.

area.areaDesc: Northern Carroll; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Grafton
